   20: -module(fun_no_module_opt_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24: 	 test1/1,overwritten_fun/1,otp_7202/1,bif_fun/1,
   25:          external/1,eep37/1,badarity/1,badfun/1,
   26:          duplicated_fun/1,unused_fun/1,parallel_scopes/1,
   27:          coverage/1,leaky_environment/1]).
   28: 
   29: %% Internal exports.
   30: -export([call_me/1,dup1/0,dup2/0]).
   31: 
   32: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   33: 
   34: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   35: 
   36: all() -> 
   37:     [{group,p}].
   38: 
   39: groups() ->
   40:     [{p,[parallel],
   41:       [test1,overwritten_fun,otp_7202,bif_fun,external,eep37,
   42:        badarity,badfun,duplicated_fun,unused_fun,
   43:        parallel_scopes,
   44:        coverage,leaky_environment]}].
   45: 
   46: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   47:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     ok.
   52: 
   53: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: %%% The help functions below are copied from emulator:bs_construct_SUITE.
   60: 
   61: -define(T(B, L), {fun() -> B end(), ??B, L}).
   62: 
   63: l1() ->
   64:     [
   65:      ?T((begin _A = 3, F = fun(_A) -> 1; (_) -> 2 end, F(2) end), 1),
   66:      ?T((begin G = fun(1=0) -> ok end, {'EXIT',_} = (catch G(2)), ok end), ok),
   67:      ?T((begin F = fun(_, 1) -> 1; (F, N) -> N * F(F, N-1) end, F(F, 5) end), 120),
   68:      ?T((begin F = fun(_, 1) -> 1; (F, N) -> N * F(F, N-1) end, F(F, 1), ok end), ok)
   69:     ].
   70: 
   71: test1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   72:     lists:foreach(fun one_test/1, eval_list(l1(), [])),
   73:     ok.
   74: 
   75: evaluate(Str, Vars) ->
   76:     {ok,Tokens,_} =
   77: 	erl_scan:string(Str ++ " . "),
   78:     {ok, [Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
   79:     case erl_eval:expr(Expr, Vars) of
   80: 	{value, Result, _} ->
   81: 	    Result
   82:     end.
   83: 
   84: eval_list([], _Vars) ->
   85:     [];
   86: eval_list([{C_bin, Str, Bytes} | Rest], Vars) ->
   87:     case catch evaluate(Str, Vars) of
   88: 	{'EXIT', Error} ->
   89: 	    io:format("Evaluation error: ~p, ~p, ~p~n", [Str, Vars, Error]),
   90: 	    exit(Error);
   91: 	E_bin ->
   92: 	    [{C_bin, E_bin, Str, Bytes} | eval_list(Rest, Vars)]
   93:     end.
   94: 
   95: one_test({C, E, Str, Correct}) ->
   96:     io:format("  ~s, ~p~n", [Str, Correct]),
   97:     if
   98: 	C == Correct ->
   99: 	    ok;
  100: 	true ->
  101: 	    io:format("ERROR: Compiled: ~p. Expected ~p. Got ~p.~n",
  102: 		      [Str, Correct, C]),
  103: 	    ct:fail(comp)
  104:     end,
  105:     if
  106: 	E == Correct ->
  107: 	    ok;
  108: 	true ->
  109: 	    io:format("ERROR: Interpreted: ~p. Expected ~p. Got ~p.~n",
  110: 		      [Str, Correct, E]),
  111: 	    ct:fail(comp)
  112:     end.
  113: 
  114: -record(b, {c}).
  115: 
  116: %% OTP-7102. (Thanks to Simon Cornish.)
  117: 
  118: overwritten_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  119:     {a2,a} = overwritten_fun_1(a),
  120:     {a2,{b,c}} = overwritten_fun_1(#b{c=c}),
  121:     one = overwritten_fun_1(#b{c=[]}),
  122:     ok.
  123: 
  124: overwritten_fun_1(A) ->
  125:     F = fun() ->
  126: 		{ok, A}
  127: 	end,
  128:     if A#b.c == [] ->
  129: 	    one;
  130:        true ->
  131: 	    case F() of
  132: 		{ok, A2} ->
  133: 		    {a2, A2};
  134: 		_ ->
  135: 		    three
  136: 	    end
  137:     end.
  138: 
  139: %% OTP-7202. The liveness calculation for the make_fun2 instruction was wrong.
  140: 
  141: otp_7202(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  142:     otp_7202().
  143: 
  144: otp_7202() ->
  145:     List = [a],
  146:     Error = case otp_7202_func() of
  147:                 no_value -> true;
  148:                 {ok, V} -> V
  149:              end,
  150:     lists:foreach(fun(_E) ->
  151:                           case Error of
  152:                               true ->
  153:                                   ok;
  154:                               false ->
  155:                                   ok
  156:                           end
  157:                   end, List).
  158: 
  159: otp_7202_func() ->
  160:     no_value.
  161:     
  162: bif_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  163:     F = fun abs/1,
  164:     5 = F(-5),
  165:     ok.
  166: 
  167: -define(APPLY(M, F, A), (fun(Fun) -> {ok,{a,b}} = Fun({a,b}) end)(fun M:F/A)).
  168: -define(APPLY2(M, F, A),
  169: 	(fun(Map) ->
  170: 		 Id = fun(I) -> I end,
  171: 		 List = [x,y],
  172: 		 List = Map(Id, List),
  173: 		 {type,external} = erlang:fun_info(Map, type)
  174: 	 end)(fun M:F/A)).
  175:     
  176: external(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  177:     Mod = id(?MODULE),
  178:     Func = id(call_me),
  179:     Arity = id(1),
  180: 
  181:     ?APPLY(?MODULE, call_me, 1),
  182:     ?APPLY(?MODULE, call_me, Arity),
  183:     ?APPLY(?MODULE, Func, 1),
  184:     ?APPLY(?MODULE, Func, Arity),
  185:     ?APPLY(Mod, call_me, 1),
  186:     ?APPLY(Mod, call_me, Arity),
  187:     ?APPLY(Mod, Func, 1),
  188:     ?APPLY(Mod, Func, Arity),
  189: 
  190:     ListsMod = id(lists),
  191:     ListsMap = id(map),
  192:     ListsArity = id(2),
  193: 
  194:     ?APPLY2(lists, map, 2),
  195:     ?APPLY2(lists, map, ListsArity),
  196:     ?APPLY2(lists, ListsMap, 2),
  197:     ?APPLY2(lists, ListsMap, ListsArity),
  198:     ?APPLY2(ListsMod, map, 2),
  199:     ?APPLY2(ListsMod, map, ListsArity),
  200:     ?APPLY2(ListsMod, ListsMap, 2),
  201:     ?APPLY2(ListsMod, ListsMap, ListsArity),
  202: 
  203:     42 = (fun erlang:abs/1)(-42),
  204:     42 = (id(fun erlang:abs/1))(-42),
  205:     42 = apply(fun erlang:abs/1, [-42]),
  206:     42 = apply(id(fun erlang:abs/1), [-42]),
  207:     6 = (fun lists:sum/1)([1,2,3]),
  208:     6 = (id(fun lists:sum/1))([1,2,3]),
  209: 
  210:     {'EXIT',{{badarity,_},_}} = (catch (fun lists:sum/1)(1, 2, 3)),
  211:     {'EXIT',{{badarity,_},_}} = (catch (id(fun lists:sum/1))(1, 2, 3)),
  212:     {'EXIT',{{badarity,_},_}} = (catch apply(fun lists:sum/1, [1,2,3])),
  213: 
  214:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch bad_external_fun()),
  215: 
  216:     ok.
  217: 
  218: call_me(I) ->
  219:     {ok,I}.
  220: 
  221: bad_external_fun() ->
  222:     V0 = idea,
  223:     fun V0:V0/V0,                               %Should fail.
  224:     never_reached.
  225: 
  226: %% Named funs.
  227: eep37(_Config) ->
  228:     eep37_basic(),
  229:     eep37_dup(),
  230:     eep37_gh6515(),
  231:     ok.
  232: 
  233: eep37_basic() ->
  234:     F = fun Fact(N) when N > 0 -> N * Fact(N - 1); Fact(0) -> 1 end,
  235:     Add = fun _(N) -> N + 1 end,
  236:     UnusedName = fun _BlackAdder(N) -> N + 42 end,
  237:     720 = F(6),
  238:     10 = Add(9),
  239:     50 = UnusedName(8),
  240:     ok.
  241: 
  242: eep37_dup() ->
  243:     dup1 = (dup1())(),
  244:     dup2 = (dup2())(),
  245:     ok.
  246: 
  247: dup1() ->
  248:     fun _F() -> dup1 end.
  249: 
  250: dup2() ->
  251:     fun _F() -> dup2 end.
  252: 
  253: eep37_gh6515() ->
  254:     {0,F1} = eep37_gh6515_1(),
  255:     F1 = F1(),
  256: 
  257:     [0,F2] = eep37_gh6515_2(),
  258:     1 = F2(0),
  259:     120 = F2(5),
  260: 
  261:     ok.
  262: 
  263: eep37_gh6515_1() ->
  264:     {case [] of
  265:          #{} ->
  266:              X = 0;
  267:          X ->
  268:              0
  269:      end,
  270:      fun X() ->
  271:              X
  272:      end}.
  273: 
  274: eep37_gh6515_2() ->
  275:     [case [] of
  276:          #{} ->
  277:              Fact = 0;
  278:          Fact ->
  279:              0
  280:      end,
  281:      fun Fact(N) when N > 0 ->
  282:              N * Fact(N - 1);
  283:          Fact(0) -> 1
  284:      end].
  285: 
  286: badarity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  287:     {'EXIT',{{badarity,{_,[]}},_}} = (catch (fun badarity/1)()),
  288:     {'EXIT',{{badarity,_},_}} = (catch fun() -> 42 end(0)),
  289:     ok.
  290: 
  291: badfun(_Config) ->
  292:     X = not_a_fun,
  293:     expect_badfun(42, catch 42()),
  294:     expect_badfun(42.0, catch 42.0(1)),
  295:     expect_badfun(X, catch X()),
  296:     expect_badfun(X, catch X(1)),
  297:     Len = length(atom_to_list(X)),
  298:     expect_badfun(Len, catch begin length(atom_to_list(X)) end(1)),
  299: 
  300:     expect_badfun(42, catch 42(put(?FUNCTION_NAME, yes))),
  301:     yes = erase(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  302: 
  303:     expect_badfun(X, catch X(put(?FUNCTION_NAME, of_course))),
  304:     of_course = erase(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  305: 
  306:     %% A literal as a Fun used to crash the code generator. This only happened
  307:     %% when type optimization had reduced `Fun` to a literal, hence the match.
  308:     Literal = fun(literal = Fun) ->
  309:                       Fun()
  310:               end,
  311:     expect_badfun(literal, catch Literal(literal)),
  312: 
  313:     ok.
  314: 
  315: expect_badfun(Term, Exit) ->
  316:     {'EXIT',{{badfun,Term},_}} = Exit.
  317: 
  318: duplicated_fun(_Config) ->
  319:     try
  320:         %% The following code used to crash the compiler before
  321:         %% v3_core:is_safe/1 was corrected to consider fun variables
  322:         %% unsafe.
  323:         id([print_result_paths_fun = fun duplicated_fun_helper/1]),
  324:         ct:error(should_fail)
  325:     catch
  326:         error:{badmatch,F} when is_function(F, 1) ->
  327:             ok
  328:     end.
  329: 
  330: duplicated_fun_helper(_) ->
  331:     ok.
  332: 
  333: %% ERL-1166: beam_kernel_to_ssa would crash if a fun was unused.
  334: unused_fun(_Config) ->
  335:     _ = fun() -> ok end,
  336:     try id(ok) of
  337:         _ -> fun() -> ok end
  338:     catch _ -> ok end,
  339:     ok.
  340: 
  341: parallel_scopes(_Config) ->
  342:     1 = parallel_scopes_1a(),
  343:     1 = parallel_scopes_1b(),
  344:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,99},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_1c(),
  345: 
  346:     10 = parallel_scopes_2a(),
  347:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,15},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_2b(),
  348:     500 = parallel_scopes_2c(500, 500),
  349:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,1000},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_2c(500, 1000),
  350:     600 = parallel_scopes_2d(600, 600),
  351:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,1000},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_2d(600, 1000),
  352:     {a,20} = parallel_scopes_2e(20, 20),
  353:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,{a,25}},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_2e(20, 25),
  354: 
  355:     {[42,2],42,a} = parallel_scopes_3(a),
  356: 
  357:     42 = parallel_scopes_4a(id(42), id(42)),
  358:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,77},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_4a(42, 77),
  359:     42 = parallel_scopes_4b(id(42), id(42)),
  360:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,77},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_4b(42, 77),
  361:     [same,2,same,2] = parallel_scopes_4c(id(same), id(same)),
  362:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,55},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_4c(42, 55),
  363: 
  364:     33 = parallel_scopes_5(id(33), id(33)),
  365:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,44},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_5(33, 44),
  366: 
  367:     99 = parallel_scopes_6(id(99), id(99)),
  368:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,88},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_6(77, 88),
  369: 
  370:     99 = parallel_scopes_7(id(99), id(99)),
  371:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,88},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_7(77, 88),
  372: 
  373:     199 = parallel_scopes_8(id(199), id(199)),
  374:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,200},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_8(id(199), id(200)),
  375: 
  376:     {299,299+299} = parallel_scopes_9(id(299), id(299), id(299+299)),
  377:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,300},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_9(id(299), id(300), id(0)),
  378:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,0},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_9(id(299), id(299), id(0)),
  379: 
  380:     999 = parallel_scopes_10(false, 999, ignored, 999),
  381:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,999},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_10(false, 700, ignored, 700),
  382:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,1000},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_10(false, 999, ignored, 1000),
  383:     999 = parallel_scopes_10(true, 999, 999, ignored),
  384:     333 = parallel_scopes_10(true, 333, 333, ignored),
  385:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,901},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_10(true, 900, 901, ignored),
  386: 
  387:     889 = parallel_scopes_11(889, 889, 889),
  388:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,800},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_11(889, 800, 889),
  389:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,810},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_11(889, 889, 810),
  390:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,889},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_11(a, a, a),
  391: 
  392:     333 = parallel_scopes_12(333, 333, 333),
  393:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,other},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_12(333, other, 333),
  394:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,nope},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_12(333, 333, nope),
  395: 
  396:     [1,100] = parallel_scopes_13(99, 100),
  397:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,no},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_13(no, 100),
  398:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,nope},_}} = catch parallel_scopes_13(99, nope),
  399: 
  400:     ok.
  401: 
  402: parallel_scopes_1a() ->
  403:     (begin X=1, true end
  404:      and
  405:      begin F=(fun () -> X=2 end), F(), true end) andalso X.
  406: 
  407: parallel_scopes_1b() ->
  408:     (begin X=1, true end
  409:      and
  410:      begin F=(fun () -> X=2 end), F(), true end) andalso (X = 1).
  411: 
  412: parallel_scopes_1c() ->
  413:     (begin X=1, true end
  414:      and
  415:      begin F=(fun () -> X=2 end), F(), true end) andalso (X = 99).
  416: 
  417: parallel_scopes_2a() ->
  418:     begin X=10, true end
  419:         and
  420:           begin F=(fun () -> X=20 end), F(), true end
  421:         and
  422:         begin X=10, true end andalso X.
  423: 
  424: parallel_scopes_2b() ->
  425:     begin X=10, true end
  426:         and
  427:           begin F=(fun () -> X=20 end), F(), true end
  428:         and
  429:         begin X=15, true end andalso X.
  430: 
  431: parallel_scopes_2c(A, B) ->
  432:     begin X=A, true end
  433:         and
  434:         begin F = (fun () -> X = make_ref() end), F(), true end
  435:         and
  436:         begin X=B, true end andalso X.
  437: 
  438: parallel_scopes_2d(A, B) ->
  439:     begin X=A, true end
  440:         and
  441:         begin F = (fun () -> X = make_ref() end), F(), true end
  442:         and
  443:         begin X=B, true end andalso (X = A).
  444: 
  445: parallel_scopes_2e(A, B) ->
  446:     begin X = {a,A}, true end
  447:         and
  448:         begin F=(fun () -> X = 20 end), F(), true end
  449:         and
  450:         begin X = {a,B}, true end andalso X.
  451: 
  452: parallel_scopes_3(A) ->
  453:     L = [X = id(42),
  454:          fun() -> X = 2 end()],
  455:     {L,X,A}.
  456: 
  457: parallel_scopes_4a(A, B) ->
  458:     4 = length([X = A,
  459:                 fun() -> X = 2 end(),
  460:                 X = B,
  461:                 fun() -> X = 2 end()]),
  462:     X.
  463: 
  464: parallel_scopes_4b(A, B) ->
  465:     4 = length([X = A,
  466:                 case id(true) of
  467:                     true ->
  468:                         fun() -> X = 2 end()
  469:                 end,
  470:                 X = B,
  471:                 case id(false) of
  472:                     false ->
  473:                         fun() -> X = 2 end()
  474:                 end]),
  475:     X.
  476: 
  477: parallel_scopes_4c(A, B) ->
  478:     [X = A,
  479:      fun() -> X = 2 end(),
  480:      X = B,
  481:      fun() -> X = 2 end()].
  482: 
  483: parallel_scopes_5(A, B) ->
  484:     4 = length([X = A,
  485:                 [fun() -> X = 2 end()],
  486:                 X = B |
  487:                 case id(false) of
  488:                     false ->
  489:                         [fun() -> X = 2 end()]
  490:                 end]),
  491:     X.
  492: 
  493: parallel_scopes_6(A, B) ->
  494:     4 = tuple_size({X = A,
  495:                     fun() -> X = 40 end(),
  496:                     X = B,
  497:                     fun() -> X = 50 end()}),
  498:     X.
  499: 
  500: parallel_scopes_7(A, B) ->
  501:     4 = tuple_size({X = A,
  502:                     [fun() -> X = 40 end()],
  503:                     X = B,
  504:                     [fun() -> X = 50 end()]}),
  505:     X.
  506: 
  507: parallel_scopes_8(A, B) ->
  508:     _ = [X = id(A),
  509:          begin fun() -> X = 2 end(), X = id(B) end],
  510:     X.
  511: 
  512: parallel_scopes_9(A, B, C) ->
  513:     3 = length([begin X = id(A), Y = id(A+B) end,
  514:                 fun() -> X = 2 end(),
  515:                 X = id(B)]),
  516:     {X,Y=C}.
  517: 
  518: parallel_scopes_10(Bool, A, B, C) ->
  519:     T = {X = A,
  520:          case id(Bool) of
  521:              true ->
  522:                  fun() -> X = 999 end(),
  523:                  X = B;
  524:              false ->
  525:                  X = C,
  526:                  fun() -> X = 999 end()
  527:          end},
  528:     2 = tuple_size(T),
  529:     X.
  530: 
  531: parallel_scopes_11(A, B, C) ->
  532:     T = {X = A,
  533:          case id(true) of
  534:              true ->
  535:                  X = B,
  536:                  2 = length([X = C, X = C]),
  537:                  fun() -> X = 889 end();
  538:              false ->
  539:                  X = cannot_happen
  540:          end},
  541:     2 = tuple_size(T),
  542:     X.
  543: 
  544: parallel_scopes_12(A, B, C) ->
  545:     T = {X = A,
  546:          case id(true) of
  547:              true ->
  548:                  fun() -> X = whatever end(),
  549:                  2 = length([X = B, X = B]),
  550:                  X = C;
  551:              false ->
  552:                  X = cannot_happen
  553:          end},
  554:     2 = tuple_size(T),
  555:     X.
  556: 
  557: parallel_scopes_13(A, B) ->
  558:     [X = 1,
  559:      fun() ->
  560:              X = id(whatever),
  561:              99 = A,
  562:              100 = B
  563:      end()].
  564: 
  565: coverage(_Config) ->
  566:     ok = coverage_1(),
  567: 
  568:     [2,3,4] = coverage_2(id([1,2,3])),
  569: 
  570:     {42,F} = coverage_3(id({[], x})),
  571:     x = F(),
  572: 
  573:     ok.
  574: 
  575: coverage_1() ->
  576:     %% Cover a line in beam_ssa_pre_codegen:need_frame_1/2 when the
  577:     %% no_make_fun3 option is given.
  578:     catch
  579:         fun(whatever) -> 0;
  580:            ("abc") -> party
  581:         end,
  582:         ok.
  583: 
  584: coverage_2(List) ->
  585:     %% Cover a line in beam_ssa_pre_codegen:need_frame_1/2 when the
  586:     %% no_make_fun3 option is given.
  587:     lists:map(fun(E) -> E + 1 end, List).
  588: 
  589: %% Cover a line in beam_block when no_make_fun3 option is given.
  590: coverage_3({[], A}) ->
  591:     {id(42), fun() -> A end}.
  592: 
  593: leaky_environment(_Config) ->
  594:     G = fun(X, Y) -> X + Y end,
  595:     F = fun(A) -> G(A, 0) end,
  596:     {'EXIT', {{badarity, {_, [1, flurb]}}, _}} = catch F(1, flurb),
  597:     ok.
  598: 
  599: id(I) ->
  600:     I.
